title: FallenSoldier
author: FallenSoldier
content: Some of you guys saw my posts and know that I started a 1k to 10000 challenge, where I fully document my journey (entry, when I close and daily update), after 19 Days, ups and downs. I can finally say proudly that I made it!! Been transparent since day 1, shared all the moves, never deleted any post or faked any shit and I am extremely proud of this achievement. 10k is not a big amount for me but the achievement is nice, also met a lot of fellow degens on the way, had a lot of fun with the community, the night trades/talks we had on tg. All to say that I LOVE YOU CRYPTO!!!Day 19 Final Update: https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1563150259991130112

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: You don’t have to create another thread for this one, updating the old thread can work.Anyway, congratulations on hitting that target and it’s really good for you. I wonder why 10k is not enough for you? Are we talking about dollar here right? That’s a lot of money already. Will try to look at your old post and see your strategies, that’s a good result especially on a market situation like this.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: I noticed your thread on this when you posted it around the half way mark and was curious for how far you'd get (especially as the market was changing while you were doing it)..(and as mentioned by scripture, it's better to make one thread documenting the whole thing than just having these announcements as some of yours have been deleted). Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AM10k is not a big amount for me This sounds like you're talking yourself up to doing 10k to 100k next time .

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AMSome of you guys saw my posts and know that I started a 1k to 10000 challenge, where I fully document my journey (entry, when I close and daily update), after 19 Days, ups and downs. I can finally say proudly that I made it!! Been transparent since day 1, shared all the moves, never deleted any post or faked any shit and I am extremely proud of this achievement. 10k is not a big amount for me but the achievement is nice, also met a lot of fellow degens on the way, had a lot of fun with the community, the night trades/talks we had on tg. All to say that I LOVE YOU CRYPTO!!!Day 19 Final Update: https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1563150259991130112If what you claim is true thenCongratulations to you! Making 10k out of 1k is a huge deal and you should be proud of yourself. I see you making over 100k in the future.I recommend getting a tradingview account for your next trading adventures. that way you can show everyone your predictions and on tradingview they make it impossible to delete your trading ideas, that way everyone can see that you are indeed an impressive trader who knows what they're doing.Best of luck to you!

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: A very good achievement because from 1k to 10k in 19 days maybe it's a fast time and what you get is very big this is certainly a journey in your futures trading going well and with a strong analysis that you do.It's hard for me to do this let alone make 9k in a short amount of time, so I can only congratulate and maybe a motivation to others to trade futures.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Congratulations! Saw your thread and your prior tweets when you started the challenge and was pretty amazed at the beginning when you went from $1k to the $3,$4k levels. Maybe keep going and see what you can get for the last day? Quote from: jackg on August 30, 2022, 01:25:07 PMQuote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AM10k is not a big amount for me This sounds like you're talking yourself up to doing 10k to 100k next time . I guess the mentality of not being limited to that 10k made it a lot comfortable to work with it maybe? Like compared to a person who only has $1k to invest, pretty sure they'd have much more stress involved or would probably take longer to actually reach the same amount of profit since he'd probably do this with a lot less risks involved.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: You should have updated your main thread rather than creating a new one though. Anyways, congratulations on your journey. Looks like your moment is here considering the market is well and shorting is the key to get profit by now. What will be your username when the bull comes raging once again in the future? LongingPrince?

comments.author: FallenSoldier
comments.body: Quote from: goldkingcoiner on August 30, 2022, 01:34:39 PMQuote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AMSome of you guys saw my posts and know that I started a 1k to 10000 challenge, where I fully document my journey (entry, when I close and daily update), after 19 Days, ups and downs. I can finally say proudly that I made it!! All to say that I LOVE YOU CRYPTO!!!Day 19 Final Update: https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1563150259991130112If what you claim is true thenCongratulations to you! Making 10k out of 1k is a huge deal and you should be proud of yourself. I see you making over 100k in the future.I recommend getting a tradingview account for your next trading adventures. that way you can show everyone your predictions and on tradingview they make it impossible to delete your trading ideas, that way everyone can see that you are indeed an impressive trader who knows what they're doing.Best of luck to you!haha thank you mate! This was just a side quest I wanted to do for a while, I've actually been a trader for years now and thankfully I am way above the 6 figures mark.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Congratulations to those of you who have reached your target. Now you have proven that you can achieve it by working hard in trading. This is a motivation for all of us because you have proven that nothing is impossible if we are willing to try.Maybe you can raise the target you want to achieve and keep trying to achieve it. And I'm sure you can do it. Once again, congratulations to you for achieving it.

comments.body: Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AMSome of you guys saw my posts and know that I started a 1k to 10000 challenge, where I fully document my journey (entry, when I close and daily update), after 19 Days, ups and downs. All to say that I LOVE YOU CRYPTO!!!Day 19 Final Update: https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1563150259991130112I agree with you because everyone who is into this cryptocurrency has a lot of experience. You can always spend time in the forum, surely you will get success from here. The goal you are presenting must be with the forum you can meet. That's why I say you can definitely bring success with cryptocurrency. I think your efforts will not be wasted.

Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AM10k is not a big amount for me This sounds like you're talking yourself up to doing 10k to 100k next time . yep he will not stop of course. he did really learn the trade well, he will crave for another success because it always feel good to achieve something. 100,000 may take time but its a game to enjoy. i was also doing this thru the memecoin, i have been trading it just to enjoy the airdrop i got from it. its not huge but sometimes the memecoin gets pumps almost quarterly so its not so bad to play it.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on August 30, 2022, 02:07:07 PMYou should have updated your main thread rather than creating a new one though. Anyways, congratulations on your journey. Looks like your moment is here considering the market is well and shorting is the key to get profit by now. What will be your username when the bull comes raging once again in the future? LongingPrince?Newbies some of them find it very difficult to understand the rudiments of posting. Exactly your point or what you emphasis here is the main thing op would have by updating it's previous thread. So from my observation what i understand is the main reason while newbies get it rigid not to know what to do at a proper time, is because lack of personal research.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Congrats!  You may want to quit while you're ahead and not risk giving it back to the house.  However, if you must, why not use 5k and absolutely save the other 5k?

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 30, 2022, 11:59:44 AMSome of you guys saw my posts and know that I started a 1k to 10000 challenge, where I fully document my journey (entry, when I close and daily update), after 19 Days, ups and downs. I can finally say proudly that I made it!! Been transparent since day 1, shared all the moves, never deleted any post or faked any shit and I am extremely proud of this achievement. 10k is not a big amount for me but the achievement is nice, also met a lot of fellow degens on the way, had a lot of fun with the community, the night trades/talks we had on tg. All to say that I LOVE YOU CRYPTO!!!Day 19 Final Update: https://twitter.com/shorterprince/status/1563150259991130112In just 19 days you actually made 1000% returns from crypto trading which I appreciate that but at the same time you need to realize that its not possible for everyone who is trying to reach and also you can't even make the same achievement again and again and if you do then you will become the richest person on this planet in the next 6months to 1 year.

comments.author: FallenSoldier
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on August 31, 2022, 03:01:45 AMCongrats!  You may want to quit while you're ahead and not risk giving it back to the house.  However, if you must, why not use 5k and absolutely save the other 5k?Haha don't worry I am a pro trader so I know how the house try to f you.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: Quote from: FallenSoldier on August 31, 2022, 04:48:22 PMQuote from: 2stout on August 31, 2022, 03:01:45 AMCongrats!  You may want to quit while you're ahead and not risk giving it back to the house.  However, if you must, why not use 5k and absolutely save the other 5k?Haha don't worry I am a pro trader so I know how the house try to f you.Wow, that's interesting. Meanwhile, the last time you shared your position was last August 26. You're not trading daily? Where else do you post your entry and exit calls? In TG? I'm already inactive in trading for like a couple of months because I always end up losing all my profits and sometimes some part of my capital after days, weeks, and months of hard work.   But if you're sharing your analysis for free I may try to copy trade. And of course, if there are profits then I'm also willing to share it.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: I am suspicious of the result obtained, since I do not find actual confirmation in the published OP screenshots, which were of a selective nature. Usually, after such challenges, it is proposed to join a paid group or transfer your money to trust management. This is just my opinion, but in any case, be careful with your money.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Congratulations on doing your challenge! It seems your a pretty confident trader knowing that you said you are way above 6 figures mark now and you did your challenge in less than a month. Just saw your twitter and it said you have experienced your 3rd halving now and I assume that your trading for a very long time. Why not spice up your challenge to be more eye catching since I guess 10k is not a big amount for you. Doing a higher stake trades with some restrictions will be good! And youtube, this thread and twitter will be a good platform for you to update your journey.
